name: Crochet at Play
description: Kat Goldin's frustration at the lack of modern and creative patterns led her to begin designing her own, sharing her projects on her popular blog and leading her to be at the forefront of the current trend for crochet. This collection of fun pieces allows children to explore their imaginations - whether on the prowl in a lion hat, riding their trusty steed hobby horse, keeping cosy while jumping in puddles with their welly warmers or resting at the end of all their adventures in a mermaid's tail sleeping bag. Projects range from hats to blankets, cardigans to dresses, and even toys for the play room and are suitable for all crocheters of all abilities.

name: Crumbz Sylvia Premium Apron
description:
Details:
Length: 80cm 
Waist: 42cm 
Fabric: 100% quilting quality cottons 
Features: a sweetheart ruffled bib, a flattering waistline and a pretty ruffled skirt with a deep matching pocket.

name: Gift Boxes
description:
Drop into the Crumbz Craft store and create your own gift box,  
or choose one from the collection we have put together.

Each box includes a Wine Glass, a ball or two of premium yarn and a scarf pattern.

Please feel free to phone us on 5962 6635 if you'd like us to customise a gift box for you.

name: Patchwork Please
description:
Get fresh inspiration with 19 quick and colourful projects!
In Patchwork, Please!, Stitch magazine contributor Ayumi Takahashi has created playful and practical patchwork projects for the home and the people who live in it. Sewing should be fun, and Ayumi Takahashi's patchwork projects embody that happy, playful approach.

name: Craft Tins
description:
Drop into the Crumbz Craft store and create your own craft tin, 
or choose one from the collection we have put together. 
Each box includes:
3 Fat Quarters
2 Gutermann Sew-all Threads
1 pair of Embroidery Scissors
3 needles
a small piece of felt and toy fill

Please feel free to phone us on 5962 6635 if you'd like us to customise a craft tin for you.

name: Best Dress (4yrs)
description:
This is one for girls who want to wear pretty dresses. It's practical, comfortable and twirly, yet it's also suitable for formal occasions.

Size: 4 yrs
Length 69cm
Fabric: 100 Cotton
More styles and sizes are available in store

Pattern size: 5-10 years

name: Kids Gardening Set for Him
description:
This cute Crumbz gardening apron/tool belt is cleverly designed with multiple pockets for allsorts of tools.

These cool gardening gloves with the extra length sleeve provide essential protection for your little ones arms from scratches, bugs and sun.

name: Flower Chalkboards
description:
These colourful flower chalkboards are so cool and would look great in any kid's bedroom or games room. They are modern, trendy, functional and loads of fun. Use as a mood board or let the kids create their daily masterpiece for all to see and share. The centre of the flower is cleverly disguised as an old-fashioned chalkboard. 

Flower Size: 110cm (high) x 70cm wide
Grass Base Size: 60cm (wide) x 30cm (high) x 17cm (deep)

Materials:
Flower: Stem and leaves are made from quality pinewood, flower petals are craft wood and the flower centre is craft wood painted with black chalkboard paint.
Optional, is a grass designed base that can be used as a useful storage unit for crafty things like chalk, dusters and toys.

Flowers are currently available in red, lime green and yellow.
Flower heads can be easily removed for cleaning.

Installation instructions are provided on how to affix the flower and base to the wall. For internal use only.

Installation services are also provided within the Yarra Valley approx. $35/hour (includes travel time) – actual price to be confirmed based on location. 

Please note: 
Postage rates are estimated at $20 (Vic) $25 NSW/SA $40 WA. A deposit of $12 will be added to all orders less than $100 at the time of purchase. We will contact you to arrange final payment based on your location and your installation requirements. Free postage on orders over $100 does not apply for this item.

name: Crumbz Gardening Apron & Gloves (click to view colour range)
description:
This cute Crumbz gardening apron is cleverly designed with multiple pockets for your garden tools and your mobile phone.

It makes a great apron for market merchants and is perfect for wait staff or florists – anyone who needs to keep the tool of their trade handy.

These cool gardening gloves with the extra length sleeve provide essential protection for your arms from scratches, bugs and sun – and trust me, once you’ve used these gloves, you’ll be a convert, and won’t want to use anything else.

name: Gloveables Waterproof Gloves (click to view colour range)
description:
Gloveable waterproof gloves are unlike any ordinary kitchen glove you've ever tried. Not only do they protect your hands, they do so in a fashionable way and are gorgeously comfortable.

Protect hands from heat, chemicals and dirt 
Ruffled fringe adds extra protection from splashes 
Long lasting, constructed of high quality materials
One standard size

name: I am a beautiful tea towel (click to view range)
description:
We chose to stock this 100% cotton tea towel due to its great absorbancy & washability. 
It measures - 50cm x 70cm and comes beautifully boxed so makes a perfect gift. 
Proudly printed and designed in Melbourne, just warm machine wash, do not bleach.

name: Making Children's Clothes, Emma Harding
description: Using just a few simple sewing techniques, discover the easy way to create fun and stylish outfits for young children (0-5 years). By combining a few easy-to-learn stitches with great fabrics and trims, expert seamstress Emma Hardy explains how to make beautiful yet practical clothes for your children. Choose from 25 different projects, including party frocks and pinafore dresses, simple shirts and elasticated trousers, sleepwear and accessories, such as hats, bibs, bootees and aprons. There are clothes for young boys and girls, toddlers and babies, plus full-size paper patterns that can easily be scaled to suit different ages. Packed with useful tips and sewing techniques, "Making Children's Clothes" provides a comprehensive guide to creating fantastic items that your child will love to wear.

name: Fishpond Chalkboard
description:
This colourful fishpond chalkboard is so cool and would look great in any kid's bedroom or games room. They are modern, trendy, functional and loads of fun. Use as a mood board or let the kids create their daily masterpiece for all to see and share. The centre of the pond is cleverly disguised as an old-fashioned chalkboard.

Size: 110cm (wide) x 63cm (high)

Materials: pond, fish and chalkboard are from quality craft wood with a pinewood storage tray
Fishponds are currently available in blue, red, lime green and yellow. 

Installation instructions are provided on how to affix the Fishpond to the wall. For internal use only.

Installation services are also provided within the Yarra Valley approx. $35/hour (includes travel time) – actual price to be confirmed based on location.

Please note: 
Postage rates are estimated at $20 (Vic) $25 NSW/SA $40 WA. A deposit of $12 will be added to all orders less than $100 at the time of purchase. We will contact you to arrange final payment based on your location and your installation requirements. Free postage on orders over $100 does not apply for this item.

description:

Apron Features:

100% Cotton

name: Recipe Journal by Abundant Earth Photography (click to view range)
description:
These handcrafted journals are perfect for gathering together your favourite receipes. The wire-bound A4 books contain double pages for 30 recipes to be handwritten, plus extra pages for writing tips and sticking in notes, as well as the recipe index.
 
Inspired by my mother's collection of handwritten notes of recipes from my grandmother, these journals are a beautiful way to start a family heirloom and to gather the family recipes that we all love.
 
Start one for your own kitchen and get your friends to write in your favourite of their recipes, or pass one on as a gift with your own recipe already handwritten inside. These journals make thoughtful and personal gifts for bridal showers, housewarmings, birthdays or even for children when they move out of home.
 
100% recycled paper (unbleached) 
Soft front cover 
Durable black hardback cover 
5 sumptuous 'Harvest' covers to choose from
 
Each journal is individually printed and made by hand. The wirebinding ensures the journal will be long-lasting and the transparent plastic cover will keep the photographic front cover clean during use in the kitchen.
 
**Limited stock remaining** 
Now $24, (RRP $34)

name: Crumbz Samantha Apron
description:
Why not wear a stylish vintage design apron when you are tackling the housework or cooking up a storm?

Length: 80cm
Waist: 46cm
Fabric: 100% quilting quality cottons

Features: adjustable neck and waist ties, pretty gathered skirt with two deep matching pockets.

description:
A new concept in multi yarn accessory knitting.  Striking blends create a mottled effect which is soft to touch and easy to knit and crochet.  Four yarns in one hank, colour matched to perfection.

Details
40% Polymide, 40% Polyester, 10% Cotton, 10% Acrylic
190m / 100g ball
Recommended needles: 10mm (to add to your cart, click ‘needle’ category in main menu)

name: The Great Australian Bake Off
description: With more than a hundred easy-to-follow recipes and numerous expert tips and step-by-step guides to hone your baking skills, this book will delight the new and experienced baker alike. If you want to achieve baking perfection, first time, every time, here is your recipe for success.

name: Noro - Silk Garden Lite
description:
Noro yarns from Japan are known worldwide for their vibrant colour combinations and their use of luxurious fibres such as mohair/silk, silk/ cashmere, pure wool and silk/wool. 

Composition: 45% Silk, 45% Mohair, and 10% Lamb's wool 
Size: 50g ball 
Length: 125m/136yd 
Recommended needle size: 4.00mm / US6 / 8UK 
Tension: 22st / 30rows over 10cm 
Washing instructions: Hand wash, dry flat 
Made in: Japan

name: Crumbz Barry BBQ Apron (click to view designs)
description:
This cleverly designed apron is a favourite with our families & friends. 
With its detachable hand towel, it is the perfect practical apron for the BBQ enthusiast or the domestic chef.

Apron Features: 
Length: 85 cm 
Width: 70 cm  
100% Cotton 
Adjustable neck and waist ties 
Easy to remove hand towel 
Large double pocket
Australian Made

name: Pattern Book - Cute and Easy Crocheted Baby Clothes by Nicki Trench
description:
This book of 35 patterns and projects will teach you how to make adorable outfits and toys for your little ones.  Using only the softest yarns, crochet expert Nicki Trench has put together this striking collection of jackets, dresses, booties, hats and toys that would make the perfect gift for newborns and toddlers. 

This book is crammed full of Breton-style sweaters and cardigans with embroidered daisies, blankets that are perfect for outdoor excursions, slippers for the tiniest of feet, pastel ponchos and an adorable crocheted animal mobile.

With 35 cute and easy projects in total, there is more than enough to keep even the keenest crochet hook busy.

name: Rowan Purelife Renew
description:
Rowan Purelife Renew is a fabulous tweedy character yarn made from recycled wool, ranging in colour from a natural stone through to a deep vibrant blue.
 
Details:
Recycled Wool: 93%, Polyamide: 7% 
Weight: 50g 
Meterage/Yardage:  75/82
Recommended needles: 6mm (to add to your cart, click ‘needle’ category in main menu)
Available patterns: to add to your cart, click ‘patterns’ category in main menu

name: Birch Bamboo Knitting Needles (25cm long)
description:
Single Pointed Bamboo Knitting Needles
Make your knitting experience as smooth as possible!
• Minimize any possibility of splitting yarns.
• The slick surface of the bamboo maintains a smooth flow of the yarn.
• Light weight - your hands will not tire even after long hours of knitting.
• The tapered point ensures that every loop is even.
• Perfect for the beginner and the people who like the feel of smooth warm bamboo passing between fingers.

name: Birch Bamboo Knitting Needles (33cm long)
description:
Single Pointed Bamboo Knitting Needles
Make your knitting experience as smooth as possible!
• Minimize any possibility of splitting yarns.
• The slick surface of the bamboo maintains a smooth flow of the yarn.
• Light weight - your hands will not tire even after long hours of knitting.
• The tapered point ensures that every loop is even.
• Perfect for the beginner and the people who like the feel of smooth warm bamboo passing between fingers.

name: Birch Coloured Knitting Needles for Children
description: Children's coloured plastic knitting pin are 18cm long and available in 5 sizes. Small sizes for little hands to learn to knit and make scarves.

name: Knitting Nancy (French Knitter)
description:
Give your kids hours of fun with this simple but fun technique of French knitting.  It's quite addictive, so if you want some peace and quiet...!

Gift includes:

French Knitter
1 ball of Shepherds 8 ply yarn

name: Crumbz Gardening Gloves for Kids
description: These cool gardening gloves come in a funky fabric adored by young gardeners.  And with the extra length sleeve, small arms are protected from scratches, bugs and too much sun.  Great to wear when helping Dad outside with jobs, and seriously, once you’ve worn these gloves, you won’t want to use anything else.

name: Kids 'Draw your own placemats' Party Pack
description:
This is a really great party pack for kids that love to do craft.

Each party pack includes:
1 packet of Fabric Fun Crayons (15 different colours) - value $12.95
6 x white cotton placemats trimmed in a variety of colours (pink, yellow, green, blue, red) - value $10 each

Using the special crayons, the kids just draw their design or picture onto the placemats and then you simply iron over, to heat set the design.

name: Sewing Book - Bend the rules Sewing
description:
Written by Amy Karol with her characteristic warmth and flair, this book gives information on basic equipment and supplies, advice on choosing and using fabrics and has a fantastic section on techniques.

In addition, Amy walks her readers through easy, inspiring patterns designed for the fashion-savvy crafter.  Try some of her playful, modern projects, such as pillows, aprons and purses.  This book will  help novices to master sewing skills and help build confidence.  Best of all, Amy explains what’s easy, what’s hard, and when not to sweat the small stuff.

With its best-friend tone, solid reference section and supercute projects, this is the introduction to sewing that you won’t want to be without.

name: Crumbz Little Samantha Apron (Christmas)
description:
Our Little Samantha apron is designed to fit tots aged 3-5 years.

Length: 50cm
Waistband: 34cm
Fabric: 100% quilting quality cottons
Features: a sweet little pocket, casing ties that slip comfortably over the head and tie neatly at the waist.

You can match these aprons with our adult Kate, Emily or Grace aprons.

name: Shoe Wine Stoppers (click to view designs)
description:
These have to be the most stylish way to keep your wine sealed!  The stoppers come in a range of patterns and colours an are a perfect gift at any time of year, but make especially good stocking presents!  

Keep your wine fresh in style with these well heeled wine stoppers.

name: Children's Book - Owl Know How
description:
This is a 32 page children’s book.  Illustrated with gorgeous photographs of cuter than cute rabbits and fluffy, colourful owls all handmade out of felt in their cardboard city.
 
The story is about solving problems.  Big problems that can only be solved with the help of owls.  Cornelia Rabbit uses her owl-know-how to save her cloud city from falling into the treetops.

The book comes with a pattern for creating a little owl of your own.

name: Crumbz Christmas Poinsettia Apron
description:
Wouldn't this make the perfect gift for your Mum this Christmas!  She'd look smart in the kitchen this Christmas in this modern, easy to wear apron.  The main fabric is bottle green with scattered red and gold holly and bows.  The apron centrepiece is a white poinsettia surrounded by traditional Christmas cheer! 

A beautiful and everlasting Christmas gift idea.

Apron Features: 
Length (top to bottom): 82 cm  
Width: 68 cm
Two matching pockets  and adjustable neck and waist ties to fit most body types. 
The beautiful fabric is comfortable to wear and looks great too! 
Handmade in Australia

name: Crumbz Josephine Apron (NEW)
description:
Josephine is the latest addition to the Crumbz’ apron range and is the Little Black Dress of aprons!
It is designed especially for the lady who wants a lot from her apron:

- practical 
- comfortable to wear 
- flattering 
 while still providing the greatest protection.  

This apron works very well in both a domestic and commercial environment.

description:

Apron Features: 
Length: 56 cm

name: Recipe Book - Australian Women's Weekly 'Classic Christmas'
description:
Christmas is the time for family celebration and this title is filled with all your seasonal favourites.  Classic Christmas is where you’ll find that recipe your mother gave you for baked ham, roast turkey, mince pies, fruit cake or Christmas pudding. 

There are traditional as well as contemporary recipes for drinks and nibbles, starters, mains, sides, puddings, cakes and edible gifts.  It’s a book you’ll hand down to your own children so that generations to come can enjoy classic Christmas food.

name: Recipe Book - Recipes Every Man Should Know
description:
Gentlemen, start your ovens!
 
We’re mixing bacon with brownies!  We’re pouring beer into chilli! We’re stirring up tomato gravy so thick and tasty, we refuse to call it sauce!  

This easy pocket-sized companion shows you how to make all the food a man can’t live without, including:
 
     •  Hearty Breakfast Classics
     •  Sandwiches, Burgers and Snacks
     •  Meat and Potato Dinners
     •  Beer, Bacon, and Bar Food
     •  Chocolate, Cheesecake & more
 
Plus a quick, no-frills guide to culinary rules and tools.  We break it all down, so you can cook like a master!

name: Book - Apronisms: Pocket Wisdom for Every Day
description:
This pretty little book asserts, "You can never have too many aprons or too many memories." Hear hear, say all at Crumbz.

Apron anecdotes and aphorisms merge with quotes, photographs and memories to offer home-spun, no-nonsense wisdom that is tinged with humour.  For the ultimate in giftability, the book's case-wrap mimics beautiful fabric.

name: Pattern Book - Beginner-Friendly Quilts
description:
Whether you are just learning to quilt or are an experienced quilter who prefers easy patterns, Beginner-Friendly Quilts has 14 perfect quilt designs.  

Each of these 14 quilts features rotary cutting and quick piecing techniques along with easy-to-follow instructions and full-colour diagrams. The quilt patterns include Double Nine Patch, Butterfly at the Crossroads, Patriotic Gem, Four-Patch, Ohio Chain, Nine Patch Chain, Old Maid's Puzzle, Friendship Album, Burgoyne Surrounded, Crown of Thorns, Chinese Coins, Roman Stripe, and two baby quilts - just for fun!

name: Coton Fifty
description:
As soon as the first days of spring arrive, this yarn is your best friend for all your lace knitting or crochet projects. With a wide range of fresh colours it will brighten up your spring projects. Coton Fifty can be machine washed and dried. 


50% ACRYLIC
50% COTTON

Skeins of 50 g / 140 m.

name: Ecoton
description:
Ecoton is a yarn made from 100 % recycled fibres. It has a slightly flecked colour that gives it a tweed-like look when knitted. Because the fibres have been processed before, this makes Ecoton stronger, more resistant to light and friction and less prone to stretching over time. The recycling process also means that it has 98% less impact on the environment than non-recycled yarn.
Now you can knit and save the planet at the same time!

4% OTHER FIBRES
48% ACRYLIC
48% COTTON

Skeins of 50 g / 130 m.

name: Sonora
description:
Garments knit in Sonora have a beautiful regular matt finish and are light to wear. It is a lovely round, springy yarn, perfect for mid season projects.

50% COTTON

Skeins of 50 g / 115 m.
